blogPost.excerpt: Upgrade Zoom with a bluetooth connected keypad that lets you run Zoom with the click of a button. Video calls are easier with your twenty-two favorite Zoom shortcuts on one amazing hotkey pad. Available for both Windows and Mac.
blogPost.body: Upgrade Zoom with a bluetooth connected keypad that lets you run Zoom with the click of a button. Video calls are easier with your twenty-two favorite Zoom shortcuts on one amazing hotkey pad. Available for both Windows and Mac.
blogPost.title: Zapp Pad - Say goodbye to Zoom fails and communicate with confidence
blogPost.author: Joe Martin

localize.description: 升级的Zoom与蓝牙连接的键盘，让你运行Zoom与点击一个按钮。视频通话更容易与你最喜欢的22个Zoom快捷键在一个惊人的热键板。适用于Windows和Mac。
升級的Zoom與藍牙連接的鍵盤，讓你運行Zoom與點擊一個按鈕。視頻通話更容易與你最喜歡的22個Zoom快捷鍵在一個驚人的熱鍵板。適用於Windows和Mac。

previous.excerpt: Track important tasks and projects, create upcoming events, keep notes and control expenses in one notion table. You can quickly find your to-do list or see how much money you spent last week.
previous.title: Magic Board for Notion - Organize your entire life with one board

localize.description: 跟踪重要的任务和项目，创建即将到来的事件，保持笔记和控制费用在一个概念表中。你可以快速找到你的待办事项，或者看到你上周花了多少钱。
localize.tagline: 用一块板子整理你的整个生活

localize.description: 跟蹤重要的任務和項目，創建即將到來的事件，保持筆記和控制費用在一個概念表中。你可以快速找到你的待辦事項，或者看到你上週花了多少錢。
localize.tagline: 用一塊板子整理你的整個生活
